post.title: What Is Lost in a Tweet

div.p: I am of the opinion that the reduced character count eliminates nuance and makes everyone sound more confident than they might otherwise feel. Most ways to couch weak opinions take up too many characters, and so they're probably the first to go. This is double-edged: people you mostly like with sound authoritative, while people you may slightly disagree with sound irrationally confident in their arguments for what you may consider to be evil.
In some ways, it's the antipode of the writing style here.
